00029 #ifndef __OSXCarbonWindow_H__
00030 #define __OSXCarbonWindow_H__
00031 
00032 // 64-bit Mac OS X doesn't support Carbon UI API
00033 #ifndef __LP64__
00034 
00035 #include "OgreOSXWindow.h"
00036 
00037 #include "OgreOSXCarbonContext.h"
00038 #include "OgreOSXCGLContext.h"
00039 
00040 namespace Ogre 
00041 {
00042     class OSXCarbonWindow : public OSXWindow
00043     {
00044     public:
00045         OSXCarbonWindow();
00046         virtual ~OSXCarbonWindow();
00047         
00048         virtual void create( const String& name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00049                 bool fullScreen, const NameValuePairList *miscParams );
00051         virtual void destroy( void );
00053         virtual bool isActive( void ) const;
00055         virtual bool isClosed( void ) const;
00057         bool isHidden(void) const { return mHidden; }
00059         void setHidden(bool hidden);
00061         void setVSyncEnabled(bool vsync);
00063         bool isVSyncEnabled() const;
00065         virtual void reposition( int left, int top );
00067         virtual void resize( unsigned int width, unsigned int height );
00069         virtual void setVisible( bool visible );
00071         virtual bool isVisible(void) const;
00073         virtual void swapBuffers( bool waitForVSync );
00075         virtual void setFullscreen(bool fullScreen, unsigned int width, unsigned int height);
00077         virtual void windowMovedOrResized();
00078 
00079         bool requiresTextureFlipping(void) const { return false; }
00080         
00081         void windowResized(void);
00082         void windowHasResized(void);
00083         
00084         void getCustomAttribute( const String& name, void* pData );
00085 
00086     private:
00087         void createNewWindow(unsigned int width, unsigned int height, String title);
00088         void createWindowFromExternal(HIViewRef viewRef);
00089         void createAGLContext(size_t fsaa_samples, int depth);
00090 
00091         WindowRef mWindow;
00092         EventHandlerRef mEventHandlerRef;
00093         HIViewRef mView;
00094         AGLContext mAGLContext;
00095         AGLPixelFormat mAGLPixelFormat;
00096         String mWindowTitle;
00097         OSXCGLContext* mCGLContext;
00098         OSXCarbonContext* mCarbonContext;
00099         bool mVSync;
00100         bool mActive;
00101         bool mClosed;
00102         bool mHidden;
00103         bool mCreated;
00104         bool mHasResized;
00105         bool mIsExternal;
00106         bool mVisible;
00107     };
00108 }

00110 #endif // __LP64__
